#summary The protocol used by Rouge server.

=Server & Authentification=

== login==

===in===
  * username: string
  * password: string
===out===
  * ret: boolean

==user.create==

===in===
  * username: string
  * password: string
  * firstname: string
  * lastname: string
  * email: string
===out (success)===
  * ret: boolean
===out (error)===
  * ret: boolean
  * error: string
